install.name: IceAccrordion
install.author: IceTheme
install.description: IceAccordion Module is ONLY for IceTheme Club Members and can be used ONLY for IceTheme Templates

param.name: iceaccordion_inactivecolor
param.label: Link Color
param.description: Link color for the accordion toggler

param.name: iceaccordion_activecolor
param.label: Link Color (Active Item)
param.description: Link color for the accordion toggler when it is selected

param.name: catid
param.label: Category Items
param.description: Assign a Category to display Items

param.name: items
param.label: Number of Items
param.description: How many items do you want to display?

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: Add a Suffix to IceAccordion Module

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
